name: trekking Lo Lo Chai Village - Lung Cu Flagpole - 422 Milestone
description:
Lung Cu flagpole, about 24km from the centre of Dong Van
district, is a tourist destination that is meaningful for domestic visitors.
Lung Cu mount is liken as “a high forehead of the motherland” where marks the
extreme North of our country. From its top, visitors can see the whole of
beautiful and spectacular landscape.
